website_summaries.verdict: Whether your next adventure is at sea or on land, the OluKai Eleu Trainer is designed to be your companion. It is constructed with water drainage in mind, so you won’t have to change out of it before jumping to your next exciting activity. However, there were shoppers not happy because the collar caused blisters. But overall, those who love this model bought extra pairs because they love it so much.
pros: Plenty of owners are impressed with how comfortable the OluKai Eleu Trainer is for extended periods of wear
A good number of reviewers commend the grip of the outsole on wet rocks, grass, muddy trails, indoor floors, and more
The quick on-and-off operation of the trainer appeals to multiple buyers
Numerous folks find this model to be suitable for water sports
The mesh upper of this walking shoe feels light and breathable, says a lot of wearers
The sporty vibe of this footgear resonates well with many shoppers
cons: Several people with high arches have complained that the upper was too tight and found it challenging to put on
The collar construction of the Eleu Trainer caused chafing and blisters to more than a few users
A consumer was disappointed because the eyelets tore off after a few weeks of use

customer_reviews.title: Toes crammed
customer_reviews.text: Olukai lovers beware. These bear no resemblance fit-wise to their street shoes, which we all love, and for good reason. Shockingly narrow. But will give them a go in the field (kayaking) and be back with more data. Perhaps they're super snug by design and will start giving a bit.
customer_reviews.author: MAntv58

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking water shoe
customer_reviews.text: I needed some good water shoes to hike the Grand Canyon. I tried these on at the store and they felt really comfortable compared to a few others. I wore them twice before the hike to break them in, but was still worried about getting blisters. I ended up bringing only these shoes. I hiked over 25 miles in these, half of that with a 50 lb pack on. I didn't get one blister and my feet were great the entire trip. I constantly got them wet crossing the river on the hike and they still felt great. My friend got a different brand and got very bad blisters. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Stoddard

customer_reviews.title: 5 which fit absolutely perfect (without socks) and I love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: I always wear a size 10 mens no matter what the description says about adjusting your size based on reviews......except this shoe! Most likely because it's made to wear without socks. I originally bought a 10 and had to send them back for a 9.5 which fit absolutely perfect (without socks) and I love the shoes. Super comfortable without socks. I haven't worn them in water yet though
customer_reviews.author: S. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great All Purpose Shoe for the Gym
customer_reviews.text: I bought my first pair in 2015 at a hotel gift shop when I forgot my work out shoes. I bought this pair on Amazon about a year and a half ago. I use these shoes for biking, light walking and general use in the gym. I also wear them on the plane as they are very comfortable or for weekends running around town doing errands. They are light and pack easily. The photo is of my 18 month old shoes.
customer_reviews.author: BC56

customer_reviews.title: Sucky shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the worst . Bought for a beach trip and tried with socks on at home ... snug but okay ... wore on trip with out socks and they ripped the skin off my ankles within one hour. These should be recalled
customer_reviews.author: Vik Mehta

customer_reviews.title: Terrific shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes. Suitable for just about anything, from sports (great for table tennis!) to casual, to walking the dog. The zip-laces work great. Occasionally I find they hang down past the bottom of the shoes and touch the ground, but if that happens I just tuck the into the shoes and the problem goes away. They last a long time and look and feel great. Two toes up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P

customer_reviews.title: High  quality shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these. Last ones last three years I think. I used these when i'm on travel which is about 1-2 weeks a month. These are great in that I can use them for running but they are super easy to slip off at airport security, they also pack flat. Everything I've ever bought from Olukai has been of high build quality and lasted a long time. They are also very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Brandt W.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying and wearing Olu Kai for just over a year now and absolutely love these shoes. Get them a size larger though. Unlike the rest of the brand that lineup, these run a bit small
customer_reviews.author: the chef

customer_reviews.title: Great Water Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear between a seven and an eight in these eights fit perfectly. I bought the shoes to use on a boat and while hiking around when we go camping. Though I have not worn them camping yet I have had them on our boat several times. They stay on my foot even when sunken mud, they wash off well, they dry off well and are very comfortable. This is my third pair of this brand and I would not hesitate to buy more of them.
customer_reviews.author: Troy R

customer_reviews.title: Great all around shoe
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light. So far even with the minimal insole support my feet don't get really sore. Nice cross trainer shoe and cool on feet. Quick drying. Good traction although on slick wet surface they do get a little slippery. Been using them for years. New design seems ok as long as they last. I like them.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Love the unique design. Comfortable, w/ great soles and insoles.
customer_reviews.text: I love the no shoelace, drawstring type design. Easy to get these shoes on and off. Insoles are confy and they breath really well. We'll see how they hold up to wear over the next six months.
customer_reviews.author: Chris H. Laco

customer_reviews.title: They seemed like they were going to be too narrow
customer_reviews.text: They seemed like they were going to be too narrow, but after a couple of trips to the gym they were comfortable enough for a run. They feel great!
customer_reviews.author: tscook

customer_reviews.title: Narrower than the usual OluKai.
customer_reviews.text: I have wider than regular feet. Usually, OluKai size 9 fits my feet just right. These shoes seem to be much narrower than usual Olukai. Looks great, made well, but goes back. Returned. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: mizwithme

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy unless you want blisters
customer_reviews.text: I wore these shoes for one day and they gave me blisters! I do not recommended! I’m going to write Olukai hoping for an exchange for a better non blistering style.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I have been averaging 4 miles for the last three days walking with these shoes. The first mile they felt a little awkward, but after the insole adapted to my foot architecture, they are extremely comfortable....thinking about buying another pair for fear, like many other shoes I have loved, may go out of production.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald J. Stern

customer_reviews.title: Very very nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are second pair for my 12 year old. Good fit and functional. They wear very well for our active lifestyle! My sons Love these shoes
customer_reviews.author: Annie Oak

customer_reviews.title: My 5th Olukai
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy general everyday casual shoe. Fits ok but lacing. It’s good but the lace is too short. I fixed it by cutting the upper loop now it fits well. I’ll buy another when these wear out.
customer_reviews.author: jarraj

customer_reviews.title: Amazing shoes but make sure you get the half size ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to send these back and get a half size smaller. Amazing shoes but make sure you get the half size smaller than normal. I wear a 10 and had to get 9.5 mens
customer_reviews.author: S. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: A great water shoe
customer_reviews.text: As a water shoe, water drains quickly through the mesh sides. Good quality materials with a sturdy sole. Good fit (10M) and comfortable out of the box. Replacing the pair that I had for two years until one shoe was left at the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Wine Lover

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe! One day of break-in and now utter ...
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe! One day of break-in and now utter comfort. Will be using these for much more than just water play. Have received several positive comments in just the first week from people who thought they looked good. Size 12 a little on the small side but not so much that it creates an issue. My wife is thinking the women's Eleu would be perfect for her needs as well.
customer_reviews.author: John R Mead

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and quick breakin
customer_reviews.text: A little smaller/lower profile than my other Olukia shoes, but true to fit, comfortable and walked a major conference immediately after purchase. Needed up exploring the outdoors, got muddy, rinsed them off and they were good to go the next day. Disregard arch support rating, I wear orthotics.
customer_reviews.author: Flatlander1200

customer_reviews.title: Great light weight shoe
customer_reviews.text: I’m on my second pair of Eleus and hope Olukai keeps making them. Wear them for errands, light hikes, gym, etc. They run small, so normally I don’t wear socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: 600NOLA

customer_reviews.title: Love the syle
customer_reviews.text: I have to we’re it and hope it fits a little better
customer_reviews.author: C......

customer_reviews.title: Sized wrong. 1 size smaller than stated.
customer_reviews.text: Item was a size too small. Cutoff window for return was too short so I’m stuck with shoes too small to wear. Did not fit close to size.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Levine

customer_reviews.title: Fits a bit small at size 12
customer_reviews.text: very much like the shoes, but they do fit small, and I am getting them exchanged for the next larger size...
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H. Davis

customer_reviews.title: I would probably wear water socks in addition to these shoes and should be good to go
customer_reviews.text: Were these through the narrows in Zion. They got well and handled well on the rocks through the river. I did end up with blister on the back of my ankle. I don't feel this was the fault of the shoes. Hiking in water over large river rock all day I'm sure will do that. I would probably wear water socks in addition to these shoes and should be good to go!
customer_reviews.author: Michael kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Feels best with no socks
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived on time and was well-packaged. Shoe fits well with no socks, tight with thin socks. Good summer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: JGCotton

customer_reviews.title: Very nice well built shoe but it was way too narrow ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice well built shoe but it was way too narrow for my feet. If you are a D or E width then this shoe is not for you.
customer_reviews.author: Doon1

customer_reviews.title: 2 pairs and over a year in.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of these I bought in a row and they are the most comfortable shoes. They are so light and they don’t need socks. I work in a garage all day and they do very well on concrete and the none slip-rubber does its job on wet surfaces. Phenomenal shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Stick to what you’re good at. My feet hurt
customer_reviews.text: Far cry from the leather Sandals. Stick to what you’re good at. My feet hurt.
customer_reviews.author: joshua hooker

customer_reviews.title: Order a half size larger than what you normally wear
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but not for people with wide feet even the sole of the shoe has a narrow base...
customer_reviews.author: Anthony T.

customer_reviews.title: blisters
customer_reviews.text: whoever said this cant be worn without socks is full of crock, 2 hours of casual city walking and blisters, 100$ down the drain. first and last time im buying from a company.
customer_reviews.author: Vladimir3d

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: i ordered my regular size & they fit great barefoot or with socks. very comfortable, well made. on my shoes the lace tightening mechanism is a pain, but still great shoes.
customer_reviews.author: CL in PDX

customer_reviews.title: Run kinda small could use a half size 12.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes but run a bit small. I am kind of stuck with them as 13s are too big. maybe they will break in after use.
customer_reviews.author: WHG

customer_reviews.title: amazing Shoe
customer_reviews.text: it fits as expected comfortable with or without socks. well ventilated and rugged.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Kurre

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe to wear and it slips on real quick and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: roger gallarde

customer_reviews.title: ... their shows this continues the line do well made comfortable shoes. Not on the expensive side but they ...
customer_reviews.text: Have a number of their shows this continues the line do well made comfortable shoes. Not on the expensive side but they last
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality and Feel
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of Olu Kai's and they are exactly what I expected. They feel and look great. Perfect for training and ability to wear without socks without the smell. Great training shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Christian F. Reinheimer

customer_reviews.title: If no sand is involved, great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Once sand gets in the shoes, it cut my foot. It could be that the shoe should have been tighter? If no sand is involved great shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shoes, but had to order 1 size up in this style.
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a size 12 but had to order a size 13 which fits perfectly. I love these shoes. Olukai builds a quality product that is comfortable and lasts.
customer_reviews.author: TyLeR

customer_reviews.title: Works great for wearing around docks, boats and the beach
customer_reviews.text: Always solid products from olukai. These are not their typical style, really light weight and built nicely.
customer_reviews.author: @WestonCPhoto

customer_reviews.title: Cool looking shoe
customer_reviews.text: Cool looking shoe. Long enough but very difficult to get me foot into the top. You can’t loosen the pull string past a point that would slow u to get you foot in and out of the shoe
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin K.

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe!! Fits well and comfortable. I will be considering more products from Olukai. I own 2 pairs of their sandals and love them!! I would give them 10 stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and ventilated shoe, but not completely open mesh.  Good for walking and light hiking. Fit is only slightly large.
customer_reviews.text: Very good shoe and fit was as expected. Wish it was a little more open mesh. My opinion is that this is a 4 1/2 star shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Walker B.

customer_reviews.title: Ninja
customer_reviews.text: Great arch support, easy to slip into and tighten up, once on they feel like part of your foot, ninja style. Olukai is a great company, I got their flip flops first, then these and now getting boots.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes..comfortable, easy to get on and off, look good. No complaints at all!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonRob

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes, great fit and excellent while climbing a waterfall. I did get little blisters at the bottom of my ankle from the back of the shoes though.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: The product description said order 1/2 size smaller.. ...
customer_reviews.text: The product description said order 1/2 size smaller... I did and too small... did a return that day and had the correct size that fit and the payment refunded within 4 days...
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Shoes look nice but left blisters on my heels.
customer_reviews.text: These shoes left blisters and cuts on my heels - I ended up just wearing them only once because of it. I didn’t even bring them home from vacation.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality on all products... will be adding to my Olukai collection most definitely!
customer_reviews.author: Sanda Cogue

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: Love Olukai flops and shoes but these just didn’t seem as well made.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: Looked great, but I couldn't really try them since the fit is too small - I almost always wear a 12 (D) - had to return these 12s and size 13 was out of stock.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Functional multi purpose water and workout shoe
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight....would like a little more toe wriggle room and cushion for workouts, but better as is for water use.
customer_reviews.author: KLD, tennis paddler

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Had to get half size larger , They run small. Very comfy water shoe
customer_reviews.author: Michael Grinnan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: nice moderate outdoor shoe. not for hiking or anything extreme
customer_reviews.author: KEVN RABICKOW

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, great for travel an very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, great for travel an very lightweight. I have a size 13.5 foot and I ordered the size 14, perfect fit. I now own 2 pairs and I don't leave home without them.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Lange

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Great shoe. Love the brand. I don’t advise wearing without socks.
customer_reviews.author: Phlamingo79

customer_reviews.title: ... to buy the next size to see if fits better. same brand but other styles fit good
customer_reviews.text: need to buy the next size to see if fits better. same brand but other styles fit good. Other than that it looks like a good shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Rubes

customer_reviews.title: looks great. Great all around training shoe
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, water proof, looks great. Great all around training shoe.
customer_reviews.author: bronco7

customer_reviews.title: Amazon service is great
customer_reviews.text: Product is good. Size is small than expected. I need to go one size bigger
customer_reviews.author: Chandrasekar

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and dry quickly
customer_reviews.text: Use for bike and paddle boarding. Comfortable and dry quickly.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: They are a great shoe, but need to order a half-size up.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable shoe. It runs a half size small though
customer_reviews.author: Michael Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes for boating and running around on the beach
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes for boating and running around on the beach. A little expensive, but I'm sure they'll last forever. Good buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are like all the other OluKai shoes I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are like all the other OluKai shoes I have purchased. Extremely comfortable and light weight. I have never been disappointed. I recommend them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Janette Lawless

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: very nice and very comfortable and fit as expected. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Marc L.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as much ankle support as my older ones. Well made
customer_reviews.author: Gary Caspersen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice appearance, good quality materials. Would prefer a wider option.
customer_reviews.author: Deepwaters

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought a half size larger and they're perfect. I like them so much I bought a second pair
customer_reviews.author: Larry Crockett

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love them
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these shoes. Very light and airy. I ware them all the time. They need to make more colors! I have all three colors
customer_reviews.author: ELLEN CAREY

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoes looked great but they run very, very narrow. I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: LYLE A.

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little small
customer_reviews.text: Good looking trainer, but runs at least a half size small
customer_reviews.author: THK

customer_reviews.title: Awesome shoes
customer_reviews.text: Maybe the most comfortable shoes I've ever worn, go with the bigger size of the two you are considering.
customer_reviews.author: Dschmidt

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and ready for summer! They are a bit more playable than expected but seem sturdy and supportive.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M. Rudary

customer_reviews.title: Like many other people mentioned these fir small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a second pair love them so much. Like many other people mentioned these fit small. I originally ordered half a point bigger but sent them back to get a full point bigger. Now that they fit well I'm very happy and they are so comfortable and also look really nice. I would recommend them to anyone as they have a pretty decent arch support for "lower" profile shoe and they are so light. Some people may just like to have half point bigger if they are using them with no socks.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Love these cross trainers!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! I'm a big fan of OluKai mesh shoes and own several pair, but didn't care for some of their other styles. I didn't know what to expect with these, but I had a big need for a good cross trainer that looked good and didn't strangle my toes. These are super comfortable, snug where you want them to be, but more forgiving in the toe box. So happy with them, I'm buying a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Rob in HB

customer_reviews.title: ... and support my very tricky Flintstone Feet and I love that I can wear them as regular shoes then ...
customer_reviews.text: These fit and support my very tricky Flintstone Feet and I love that I can wear them as regular shoes then also just wear them into the ocean. They dry pretty quickly. Love them love them love them.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa Redshaw

customer_reviews.title: Light weight shoes for around water or no socks.
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and comfortable shoes. They are perfect for wearing around the water and without socks. Based on other reviews to order a half size larger, I did and they fit perfectly. I would also advise ordering a half size larger than your normal sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Dolphin Venture Man/Joe Becker

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than size on shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have to return the shoes... they are a half size or more too small. I have three different pairs of OluKai Shoes. One is a half size too large, another is as expected and the other is a half too small. They are obviously all over the board with different models of foot wear.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoeblue

customer_reviews.title: He likes Olukai very much and these sneakers are extremely lightweight and nicely made. They definitely fulfill their purpose fo
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these as a gift for my husband but I had to reorder because I ordered the wrong size! He likes Olukai very much and these sneakers are extremely lightweight and nicely made. They definitely fulfill their purpose for use in training
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Returned as size is not even close to other manufacturers ...
customer_reviews.text: Returned as size is not even close to other manufacturers (or even OluKai's other shoes-which are usually a tad oversized).
customer_reviews.author: schnell

customer_reviews.title: Holy blisters
customer_reviews.text: It's sad to say after owing multiple pairs of olukai footwear over the years that these shoes were the most uncomfortable pair I have ever bought. I had read about heel blisters on some reviews and let me tell ya that within 5 min I had hot spots and after 15 min they were fully formed blisters. Someone on the design team really dropped the ball by putting heavy gauge nylon stitching at the top of the heel cup. The shoes were also much more narrow than any other sandle or shoe that I have bought from olukai. At least the foot bed was still comfortable. But for the price these are packed and ready for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle C. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. So far I love them. Lightweight and they let your feet breathe. Awesome shoe!
customer_reviews.author: Sunrise

customer_reviews.title: The comments all recommended to order a half size larger
customer_reviews.text: The comments all recommended to order a half size larger. I did and they are still somewhat tight. I can't wear thick socks with them. So maybe 2 half sizes larger if you want to wear thick socks with them.
customer_reviews.author: Martyt50

customer_reviews.title: Shoes don't Fit
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are too small. I will call next week and return them
customer_reviews.author: Peter E. Dardis

customer_reviews.title: Huge dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, but ultimately not wearable. I love Olukai products--I have owned a half a dozen of their products over the last decade or so--but these are terrible. Something about the design has resulted in the back of the shoe rubbing the skin off the area near my achilles. Very painful, especially when that area is wet, which is the intended use for these shoes. Note: It wasn't the sizing because I tried both the 10.5 and the 11, and these fit my foot best. Would not buy again, and would return if I hadn't already tested them out on vacation.
customer_reviews.author: J. Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Warning !!! Don't buy !
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend you don't buy these shoes.My son and constant blisters and cuts that total 18 areas he's bleeding and has blisters! These are so overpriced for the quality. I'm extremely disappointed because I wanted my son to have a nice pair of water shoes for work ( he's a lifeguard) that didn't hurt his feet. The seller was not accommodating and wouldn't return the shoes ! Don't deal with seller or this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: crystaldri

product_meta.title: OLUKAI Eleu Trainer - Men's Black/Black
product_meta.description: Agile and amphibious, the vegan OluKai® 'Eleu Trainer adds ease and protection where you need it most! Water-resistant man-made material designed to look or function like leather. Hydrophobic and perforated to save weight and shed water. Forefoot flex grooves allow natural forefoot flexion and toe-off. Rounded edges for improved agility. Dual-density EVA anatomical footbed is removable and washable. Provides excellent cushion and support. Sticky-rubber outsole to increase wet surface traction. Outsole traction pattern follows natural foot-strike. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 8 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
feature_bullets: Agile and amphibious, the vegan OluKai® 'Eleu Trainer adds ease and protection where you need it most!
Water-resistant man-made material designed to look or function like leather.
Material Composition: 100% High Quality Synthetic Materials
Hydrophobic and perforated to save weight and shed water.
Forefoot flex grooves allow natural forefoot flexion and toe-off.

Rounded edges for improved agility. Dual-density EVA anatomical footbed is removable and washable. Provides excellent cushion and support. Sticky-rubber outsole to increase wet surface traction. Outsole traction pattern follows natural foot-strike. Imported. Measurements: Weight: 8 oz Product measurements were taken using size 11, width D - Medium. Please note that measurements may vary by size. Weight of footwear is based on a single item, not a pair.
